title: 1995년 Webster 사건

description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: UNITED STATES of America, Appellee, v. Anthony F. WEBSTER, Defendant, Appellant; UNITED STATES of America, Appellee, v. Robert A. BOUTHOT, A/K/A Robert H. Bouthot, Defendant, Appellant; UNITED STATES of America, Appellee, v. Manuel D. RAVELO, Defendant, Appellant; UNITED STATES of America, Appellee, v. Warren R. HUNTINGTON, Defendant, Appellant

**판사**: Boudin, Campbell, Gibson, John

    UNITED STATES of America, Appellee,v.Anthony F. WEBSTER, Defendant, Appellant.UNITED STATES of America, Appellee,v.Robert A. BOUTHOT, a/k/a Robert H.     Heard March 3, 1995.Decided April 27, 1995.
